This is an app that helps beginners learn to juggle.

To use the app, tap on one of the tricks. This will take you to a training activity screen. On the training activity screen, you can see an animation of the trick. Try it for yourself! Enter your personal record using the scroll wheels in the bottom right hand corner of the screen. Press update record when you are done. 

As you personal record creep toward the goals, your level will increase. Try to get to level 5! 

The animations come from gunswap.co. 

This is the beginner verson of sunswap. An intermediate and advanced versions are also avaliable.
